alert.note: Alert for Haskell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 11 at 6:00PM CDT until September 11 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Haskell County in west central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Jud, or 13 miles west of O`Brien, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... O`Brien around 620 PM CDT. Rochester around 625 PM CDT. Rule around 630 PM CDT. Sagerton around 635 PM CDT. Weinert around 640 PM CDT. Haskell around 645 PM CDT. Stamford, Paint Creek, Lake Stamford Marina and Irby around 700 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Jud, Us- 277 Near The Haskell-Knox County Line and Us-380 Near The Haskell- Stonewall County Line. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
